mapper.delete:
update zx_ct_Contract set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id in
#{model.id}
mapper.update: update zx_ct_Contract set contractCost = #{contractCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user = #{modifyUser}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and orgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT zcc.*, zcw.`status` AS worksAuditFlag, zcw.pp1 AS worksVerificationFlag FROM zx_ct_contract AS zcc LEFT JOIN zx_ct_workbook AS zcw ON zcc.orgID = zcw.orgID AND zcw.del_flag = '0' WHERE zcc.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.id IN
#{model.id}
mapper.update: UPDATE zx_ct_contract AS zcc SET zcc.isSettle = '1' WHERE zcc.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.isSettle != '1' AND ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT zgcc.orgID AS orgID FROM zx_gcsg_ct_contract AS zgcc WHERE zgcc.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.orgID = zgcc.orgID AND zgcc.settleType IN ('实际无结算', '结算开始执行') UNION ALL SELECT zcsc.orgID AS orgID FROM zx_ct_supplies_contract AS zcsc WHERE zcsc.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.orgID = zcsc.orgID AND zcsc.settleType IN ('实际无结算', '结算开始执行') UNION ALL SELECT zcec.orgID AS orgID FROM zx_ct_eq_contract AS zcec WHERE zcec.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.orgID = zcec.orgID AND zcec.settleType IN ('实际无结算', '结算开始执行') UNION ALL SELECT zcom.orgID AS orgID FROM zx_ct_other_manage AS zcom WHERE zcom.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.orgID = zcom.orgID AND zcom.settleType IN ('实际无结算', '结算开始执行') UNION ALL SELECT zcfc.orgID AS orgID FROM zx_ct_fs_contract AS zcfc WHERE zcfc.del_flag = '0' AND zcc.orgID = zcfc.orgID AND zcfc.settleType IN ('实际无结算', '结算开始执行') ) AS tabA ) > 0
